attributes.action: give the RNLI and other charities that provide search and rescue services 100% exemption from radio license fees proposed by OFCOM in the 'Applying Spectrum Pricing to the Maritime and Aeronautical Sector' consultation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The OFCOM consultation finishes on October 31st 2008. To contribute to the consultation, visit the OFCOM website.
The RNLI estimate that the proposed licence fees will cost them £250,000 each year.
The RNLI is a charity that has provided vital life-saving services for 200 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
